mapper.select: select tag_id as tagid, father_id as fatherid, tag_name as tagname, tag_point as tagpoint, tag_type as tagtype, tag_follower as followers, bs_flag as bsflag from tag order by tag.tag_follower desc

select tag_id as tagid, father_id as fatherid, tag_name as tagname, tag_point as tagpoint, tag_type as tagtype, tag_follower as followers, bs_flag as bsflag from tag where tag.tag_name like '%'+#{likename}+'%' order by tag.tag_point desc
select tag_id as tagid, father_id as fatherid, tag_name as tagname, tag_point as tagpoint, tag_type as tagtype, tag_follower as followers, bs_flag as bsflag from tag where tag.tag_name = #{tagStr}

select t.tag_id as tagid, t.father_id as fatherid, t.tag_name as tagname, t.tag_point as tagpoint, t.tag_type as tagtype, t.tag_follower as followers, t.bs_flag as bsflag, if(loginf.upper,1,0) as followed from tag t left join follow loginf on(loginf.upper = t.tag_id and loginf.follower = #{loginuserid} and loginf.follow_type = '4') where t.tag_id = #{tagid}

select tag_id as tagid, father_id as fatherid, tag_name as tagname, tag_point as tagpoint, tag_type as tagtype, tag_follower as followers, bs_flag as bsflag from tag where tag.father_id = #{fatherid} and tag.bs_flag = "1" order by tag.tag_follower desc

select son.tag_id as tagid, son.father_id as fatherid, son.tag_name as tagname, son.tag_point as tagpoint, son.tag_type as tagtype, son.tag_follower as followers, son.bs_flag as bsflag from tag son inner join tag father on(father.tag_id = son.father_id and father.tag_name =#{fatherStr} ) where son.bs_flag = "1" and father.bs_flag = "1" order by father.tag_follower desc

select t.tag_id as tagid, t.father_id as fatherid, t.tag_name as tagname, t.tag_point as tagpoint, t.tag_type as tagtype, t.tag_follower as followers, t.bs_flag as bsflag from tag t inner join follow f on(f.upper = t.tag_id and f.follower = #{docid} and f.follow_type = '5') where t.bs_flag = '1'

select t.tag_id as tagid, t.father_id as fatherid, t.tag_name as tagname, t.tag_point as tagpoint, t.tag_type as tagtype, t.tag_follower as followers, t.bs_flag as bsflag, if(loginf.upper,1,0) as followed from tag t inner join follow f on (f.upper = t.tag_id and f.follower = #{userid} and f.follow_type = '4') left join follow loginf on(loginf.upper = t.tag_id and loginf.follower = #{loginuserid} and loginf.follow_type = '4') where t.bs_flag = "1" order by f.create_date desc limit #{start}, #{end} ;

select son.tag_id as tagid, son.father_id as fatherid, son.tag_name as tagname, son.tag_point as tagpoint, son.tag_type as tagtype, son.tag_follower as followers, son.bs_flag as bsflag from tag son inner join tag father on(father.tag_id = son.father_id and father.tag_name =#{fatherStr} ) where son.bs_flag = "1" and father.bs_flag = "1" and son.tag_name = #{tagStr} order by father.tag_follower desc
mapper.update: update tag set tag.tag_point=tag_point+1 where tag.tag_id = #{tagid}
